net.proteusframework.cms

Class BasePageElementModelFactory<PE extends PageElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.AbstractPageElementModelFactory<PE>
      • net.proteusframework.cms.BasePageElementModelFactory<PE>
  • Type Parameters:
    PE - the page element type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageElementModelFactory<PE>

    public class BasePageElementModelFactory<PE extends PageElement>
extends AbstractPageElementModelFactory<PE>
    Component provider implementation that only returns the base component.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • createInstance

        public PE createInstance(PageElementModel<PE> component)
        Description copied from interface: PageElementModelFactory
        Create an instance of the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component.
        Returns:
        the PageElement instance. For backward compatibility, the PageElement shouldn't have a component identifier set if the component is a Base Component.

      • getComponent

      • getVirtualComponents

        public List<PageElementModel<PE>> getVirtualComponents(CmsSite site)
        Description copied from interface: PageElementModelFactory
        Get the virtual components.
        Parameters:
        site - the site. May be null. If null, the provider should not return any site specific components.
        Returns:
        the components.
